DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine ability family-focused , office-based intervention improve medical behavioral outcome child adolescent type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Intensive Care Program Youth With Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Age 816 year Type 1 diabetes diagnose standard American Diabetes Association criterion Type 1 diabetes duration least 6 month Residence northeastern U.S . Established clinic patient Fluency English Spanish Major psychiatric disorder ( e.g. , major depression , severe eat disorder , mental retardation ) Unstable living environment ( e.g. , Department Social Services Department Youth Services involvement )
